post.author: 이상윤
post.content:
Web Developer
Exam 70-536: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Application Development Foundation
Exam 70-528: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Web-based Client Development
Exam 70-547: PRO: Designing and Developing Web Applications by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework  (Book link:  no reference)

Web Developer Upgrade
Exam 70-551: UPGRADE: MCAD Skills to MCPD: Web Developer by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework.


Windows Developer
Exam 70-536: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Application Development Foundation
Exam 70-526: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Windows-Based Client Development
Exam 70-548: PRO: Designing and Developing Windows Applications by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework

Windows Developer Upgrade
Exam 70-552: UPGRADE: MCAD Skills to MCPD Windows Developer by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework



Enterprise Applications Developer
Exam 70-536: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Application Development Foundation
Exam 70-526: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Windows-Based Client Development
Exam 70-528: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Web-Based Client Development
Exam 70-529: TS: Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 - Distributed Application Development
Exam 70-549: PRO: Designing and Developing Enterprise Applications by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework



Enterprise Applications Developer Upgrade
Exam 70–553: UPGRADE: MCSD Microsoft .NET Skills to MCPD: Enterprise Application Developer by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework: Part 1
Exam 70–554: UPGRADE: MCSD Microsoft .NET Skills to MCPD: Enterprise Application Developer by Using the Microsoft .NET Framework: Part 2

MCTS를 취득 하기 위해서는 다음과 같은 시험을 준비 하셔야 합니다.


2007년 5월 말까지
Microsoft Exam Insurance
Get two chances to pass your Microsoft Certification exam Or, pass on your first try and save 25 percent on your next exam

http://www.microsoft.com/learning/mcp/offers/insurance/default.mspx
post.title: 자격증 정보 입니다
